name: Old World (itch) (zielonoludek)
description:
Controls:
  • A or D - to move left or right
  • SPACE - jump or 2x SPACE to double jump
  • C & CTRL - crouch - spikes kills if player is not crouching
  • Q - flashlight
  • Left Shift or Left Mouse button- push object 
  • 0 - load last checkpoint
